channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Steve Jobs Hypes Up ‘Toy Story’ and Pixar in Unearthed Interview
item.description: To celebrate the 30th anniverary of 'Toy Story,' the Steve Jobs Archive shared an interview of Jobs singing Pixar's praises.

item.title: You can buy Ray-Ban Meta glasses for their cheapest-ever price thanks to Black Friday
item.description: Forget every other Black Friday deal: you can get Ray-Ban Meta glasses for 20% off.

item.title: Black Friday tablet deals are the best I've ever seen, with the lowest prices on the newest iPad tablets, Galaxy Tab, Amazon Fire and plenty of bargain options
item.description: Black Friday tablet deals span the entire tablet market from the best Galaxy Tab S tablets to the cheapest Amazon Fire tablets, with everything in between. We round up all the best deals here.

item.title: Google Adds Gemini AI-Assistant to Android Auto
item.description: Gemini is spreading its tendrils to millions of additional vehicles.

item.title: WhatsApp security flaw lets experts scrape 3.5 billion user numbers - here's what we know, and how to stay safe
item.description: Study finds WhatsApp contact-discovery flaw allowed scraping of 3.5 billion accounts, exposing metadata and encryption key reuse.

item.title: New to Prime Video? Start with these 3 movies with over 90% on Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: If you've just got your hands on Prime Video, you won't want to miss these movies.

item.title: Amazon starts Prime payouts from $2.5 billion settlement – here's how the refunds work and when you might get one
item.description: Amazon's started paying out $1.5 billion of its record-breaking settlement with the FTC which is earmarked to refund Prime customers.

item.title: Activists Are Using 'Fortnite' to Fight Back Against ICE
item.description: Players are roleplaying ICE raids in Fortnite and Grand Theft Auto to prepare for real-world situations.

item.title: RFK Jr. Is Now Blaming Vaccines on Peanut Allergies, Despite the Evidence
item.description: At a recent event this week, the health secretary speculated that aluminum in vaccines is causing children's peanut allergies.

item.title: Is Nvidia opening up its NVLink doors even further? New partnership with AMD will see greater integration across many kinds of chips
item.description: Nvidia NVLink Fusion now integrates with Arm-based Neoverse CPUs, enabling hyperscalers and governments to deploy GPUs efficiently in workstations and servers.

item.title: The History of the War That Shaped ‘The Phantom Menace’
item.description: Although the 'Star Wars' prequels went on to feature a much more infamous conflict, a crucial battle emerged before 'The Phantom Menace' that would shape galactic politics for a generation.

item.title: 65+ early Black Friday deals: Score huge discounts on MacBooks, AirPods, Kindles, Bose headphones, and Ninja appliances
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: 70+ Amazon Black Friday deals: We found record prices on AirPods, Kindles, and Anker power stations
item.description: The Amazon Black Friday sale has deals on Apple, Kindle, Bose, Lego, Samsung, and plenty more. AirPods 4 with ANC hit a new record-low price as we were typing this story.

item.title: I love this bass-heavy Bluetooth speaker, and it’s cheaper than ever for Black Friday
item.description: I love this bass-heavy Bluetooth speaker and now it's cheaper than ever for Black Friday.

item.title: The Black Friday deal I've been waiting for - LG's 65-inch C5 OLED TV is on sale for its lowest price ever
item.description: This is the Black Friday deal I've been waiting for - the LG 65-inch C5 OLED TV is on sale for a new record-low price thanks to a massive $1,400 discount.

item.title: You can now try the Xbox Full Screen Experience on any PC, laptop, or tablet
item.description: Microsoft is bringing the Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE), which adds a console-like UI while navigating through your game library on a PC with a controller, to laptops, desktops, and tablets. FSE launched with the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X, and it has so far only been available on PC handhelds. The expansion to […]

item.title: The PlayStation Portal has hit its lowest ever price for Black Friday, and it's impossible to ignore at this price and after its game-changing update
item.description: The PlayStation Portal is now at its lowest ever price for Black Friday. After recent updates, I recommend it as a must-buy.

item.title: Comet AI browser lands on Android
item.description: Perplexity's Comet browser brings smart, voice-enabled AI help to mobile browsing, aiming to turn every tab into a conversation.

item.title: Do Not, Under Any Circumstance, Buy Your Kid an AI Toy for Christmas
item.description: Somehow worse than screens.

item.title: One of the best Assassins Creed games might get a remake very soon
item.description: 'Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag' is shockingly old enough that Ubisoft might release a remake in the next dew months.
